com.hybris.services.entitlements.api

Interface EntitlementFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEntitlementFacade, DefaultEntitlementRestClient, StubEntitlementFacade

    public interface EntitlementFacade
    Entitlement service operations.

    • Method Detail

      • createGrant

        GrantData createGrant(GrantData grantData)
               throws ValidationException,
                      ServiceException
        Grant entitlement to user.
        Parameters:
        grantData - entitlement definition
        Returns:
        created grant
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if incorrect parameters passed
        ValidationException - if grantData is invalid (see exception message for details)
        ServiceException - if creation of service was failed. One of possible reasons is accidental duplicating grant ids. Then you can call the method again to give it a shot to generate another id.

      • execute

        ExecuteResult execute(String action,
                      String userId,
                      String entitlementType,
                      List<CriterionData> criteria,
                      boolean details)
               throws ValidationException
        Perform given action on user's entitlements.
        Parameters:
        action - action to perform. See Actions for possible options.
        userId - user identifier
        entitlementType - type of entitlement
        criteria - execution criteria
        details - if true - return list of effective grants.
        Returns:
        true if user is entitled
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if criteria have any malformed items

      • execute

        ExecuteManyResult execute(String action,
                          String userId,
                          List<ExecuteManyData> executeManyDataList,
                          Boolean details)
                   throws ValidationException
        Perform given action on user's entitlements.
        Parameters:
        action - action to perform. Only check is supported yet.
        userId - user identifier
        executeManyDataList - the list of executeManyData
        details - if true - return list of effective grants.
        Returns:
        results of action in the same order as executeManyDataList.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if executeManyDataList was not validated

      • getGrants

        List<GrantData> getGrants(String userId,
                          String entitlementType,
                          String grantSource,
                          String grantSourceId)
                   throws ValidationException
        Get effective user grants by filter.
        Parameters:
        userId - user identifier
        entitlementType - type of entitlement. Omit to get all user entitlements.
        grantSource - the reason of grant. Omit to do not take the reason into account. Must be null if entitlementType is null.
        grantSourceId - external id. Omit to do not take it into account. Must be null if grantSource is null.
        Returns:
        list of found grants.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the filter is wrong

      • revokeGrants

        void revokeGrants(String userId,
                  String entitlementType,
                  String grantSource,
                  String grantSourceId)
           throws ValidationException
        Revoke user grants by filter.
        Parameters:
        userId - user identifier
        entitlementType - type of grant. Omit to revoke all user grants.
        grantSource - the reason of grant. Omit to do not take the reason into account. Must be null if entitlementType is null.
        grantSourceId - external id. Omit to do not take it into account. Must be null if grantSource is null.
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the filter is wrong

      • revokeGrant

        void revokeGrant(String grantId)
          throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Revoke grant by internal identifier.
        Parameters:
        grantId - identifier
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException - if grant does not exits

      • updateConditions

        GrantData updateConditions(String grantId,
                           List<ConditionData> conditionDataList)
        Update existing grant.
        Parameters:
        grantId - the id of grant to update conditions
        conditionDataList - the list of conditions to modify
        Returns:
        updated grant

      • deleteConditions

        GrantData deleteConditions(String grantId,
                           String conditionType)
        Delete grant condition(s).
        Parameters:
        grantId - grant id
        conditionType - type of condition to remove. Null to delete all grant conditions
        Returns:
        updated grant

      • updateGrantStatus

        GrantData updateGrantStatus(String grantId,
                            Status status)
        Updates grant status data.
        Parameters:
        grantId - identifier
        status - new status.
        Returns:
        GrantData

      • createGrantProperty

        GrantData createGrantProperty(String grantId,
                              String name,
                              String value)
                       throws ValidationException
        Create dynamic grant property.
        Parameters:
        grantId - grant to add property to
        name - name of new property
        value - value of the property
        Returns:
        updated grant of null if the property already exists
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if property is exist

      • deleteGrantProperty

        GrantData deleteGrantProperty(String grantId,
                              String name)
                       throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Remove dynamic grant property.
        Parameters:
        grantId - grant id
        name - property to remove
        Returns:
        updated grant
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException - if grant does not exits

      • updateGrantProperty

        GrantData updateGrantProperty(String grantId,
                              String key,
                              String value)
                       throws ValidationException
        Update existing dynamic grant property.
        Parameters:
        grantId - identifier
        key - name of property
        value - value of property
        Returns:
        updated grant or null if such property has already benn created
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if property is exist

      • addGrantProperty

        GrantData addGrantProperty(String grantId,
                           String key,
                           int amountToAdd)
                    throws ValidationException
        Add specified value to existing grant property's value. Can be negative.
        Parameters:
        grantId - identifier
        key - name of property
        amountToAdd - amount to add
        Returns:
        updated grant or null if such property has already benn created
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if property is exist

      • getGrant

        GrantData getGrant(String grantId)
            throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Get grant by its id.
        Parameters:
        grantId - the grant's id.
        Returns:
        found grant.
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException - if grant does not exits
